column2: but wanted to write a review for Lou Malnati's outstanding service. I mistakenly ordered a pizza with pork on it
column3: and only realized it upon getting back to my place. I called them and asked if there was anything they could do about it. Without hesitation
column4: the manager said to just come back and they'd get us the right pizza. No questions asked
column5: right off the bat. The pizza was great as it always is
column6: but the service here is what truly made it exceptional.
